mapper.select: SELECT collection_id, COALESCE(name_en, name) AS name, description, creator_id, created_at, updated_at FROM collection WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId}
SELECT collection_id, COALESCE(name_en, name) AS name, description, creator_id, created_at, updated_at FROM collection WHERE creator_id = #{creatorId}
SELECT collection_id, COALESCE(name_en, name) AS name, description, creator_id, created_at, updated_at FROM collection WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} AND creator_id = #{creatorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection (name, description, creator_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{creatorId})
